overview:
Joe Colopy is the Founder and CEO of Bronto Software, a leading email marketing provider for over a thousand e-commerce driven companies like Gander Mountain, Party City and Trek Bikes.

Joe has guided the strategic direction of Bronto from a start-up, borne out of his spare bedroom, to becoming one of the 100 fastest growing private software companies in the United States.

Under Joeâ€™s leadership, Bronto has had tangible impact on the Triangle community - creating over 80 new, well-paying jobs since 2002 and contributing over 8 weeks worth of community service during 2009.

Joe received his Bachelor of Arts in Computer Science from Harvard and his MBA from UNC at Chapel Hill and has been featured in business publications both nationally and in the Triangle.
